name: ZOMBUSTERS!
description:
It's the year 20XX and the world is being ravaged with a deadly virus that turns anybody into a zombie. Luckily for you, you're an army vet with a gun. Defend your home and your family from an endless wave of zombies before you're the ones that get infected. 

External Resources Used

  • Player's Gun
  • Houses
  • Street and Road Objects
  • Street Props
  • Other Street Props
  • Chain Fences
  • Tank
  • Big Zombie
  • Regular Zombie
  • Skybox
  • Font
  • BGM
  • Textures (GAMEDEV_Reusables Pack)

A game by team Abyss Order

  • eoss akira ( https://eoss-akira.itch.io )
  • Renkuro ( https://renkuro.itch.io )
  • RAEL

This game was made as a submission to the INDIE + GDFUNDA Game Jam Part 2.
